NF.Q: In the column Treatment Types of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 5227? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Chronic Patients to node Clinics and from node Improved Condition to node Surgery, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Therapy to node Chronic Patients, from node Therapy to node Pregnant Women, and from node Emergency Care to node Children, which path has the largest flow?

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Full Recovery to target node Nursing Homes? Please list all node labels along this path.
